body_html:
@lerynth I was able to solve this. See here:
http://stackoverflow.com/q/38585357/697598

On Sun, 14 Aug 2016 at 06:40, lerynth notifications@github.com wrote:

@buriy https://github.com/buriy, thanks for your suggestion. I tried
you solution,
including using older bazel version, but unfortunately
it still doesn't work. Is this due to using GTX 1080?

So let me update my environment:

OS: Ubuntu 16.04
Compiler: gcc-4.9
CUDA: 8.0
CuDNN: 5.0

GTX 1080

—
You are receiving this because you commented.
